summary: Un-enchanted GuildMaster Hood, Changed its properties to Heavy.
descriptionHtml:
>I created this mod obviously for me, because finding an un-enchanted GM Hood doesn\\\\\\\'t EXIST!.maybe,i dont know. 

Maybe you might also need a hood for your badass deadric armor, or stuff. This hood 
will get the benefits of \"well fitted\"(not tested) Because of its Heavy Armor Properties.

>Its properties is changed to Heavy and can be tampered with 1 Leather and 1 Void Salts.

>How to get it!?
1.Just Open Up Console (~) Then Type \"Help Zach 4\" 
2.Then Type in \"player.additem <code here> 1 (the console code might be different)
3.Ofc you have to add an enchantment, to change its name.

>Enjoy... Oh Do Endorse too if you liked it.
>No i wont do a light armor. Or Updates. Maybe. I dont know. I just want to play. :D
author: Zachriel
